column6: Emma Frost, She-Hulk, Agent Brand, Hellcat, Valkyrie, Monica Rambeau, Sue Storm...these mighty women will be put to the test as never before, as cities are destroyed, families are torn apart, and a cosmic resurrection changes the heroes' lives forever!
column8: | writer:Kathryn Immonen | penciler:Jelena Kevic Djurdjevic | penciller:Tonci Zonjic
